7 Mathematical formulas and expressions 7.1 Inline 7.2 Paragraphed 7.3 Multi step

7 Mathematical formulas and expressions 7.1 Inline This is an example of an inline mathematical expression:\(f(k) = {n \choose k} p^{k} (1-p)^{n-k}\) 7.2 Paragraphed This is an example of a formula that starts on a new paragraph: \[f(k) = {n \choose k} p^{k} (1-p)^{n-k}\] 7.3 Multi step This is an example of a multiline expression: \[\begin{equation} f\left(k\right)=\binom{n}{k}p^k\left(1-p\right)^{n-k}\\ E=mc^2\\ a^2 = b2 + c^2 \tag{7.1} \end{equation}\] Proof (Theorem). Example of a theorem. \[f\left(k\right)=\binom{n}{k}p^k\left(1-p\right)^{n-k}\] \[f\left(k\right)=\binom{n}{k}p^k\left(p+1-2p\right)^{n-k}\]
